title: Learn about the interpretation of dates in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dates in a dream for a single woman: Dates are a type of fruit that many people love and have an essential role in Ramadan. Either seeing dates in a dream for a girl is good, or there are some other nutritional elements that she should know. After that, we will explain each piece of evidence so that he can be reassured and not distracted between interpretations. Different. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a date in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the happiness and joy that she enjoys as a result of the freedom and stability in which she lives in her father’s house. Seeing a date in a dream for a girl means that she will find a job opportunity that will improve her financial income and help her achieve Her desires are fulfilled immediately.Interpretation of dates in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that seeing dates in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the good luck that she will enjoy in her next life after getting rid of sorrows, and dates in a dream for a girl symbolize her good morals and closeness to the path Correct and touch it. With religion and Sharia, she is on her way to excellence until the satisfaction of her Lord. Seeing a date in a dream for a girl means her close marriage to a wealthy man who has a high status in society, and she will live with him in love and prosperity. The corrupted dates in the dreamer’s sleep indicate that he indulges in the mistakes and sins that he commits and brags about among people. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of dates in A dream for a single woman from Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that she saw dates eating in a dream for an unmarried woman, indicating the end of the pain that she complained about in the previous period and it had a negative impact on her spirit. Dates in a dream for a girl indicate her good reputation and good reputation. Reputation of behavior among people.Seeing dates in a dream for a girl leads to positive transformations that will change her life from extreme poverty and material difficulties to joy, wealth and luxury. Dates in the dreamer’s sleep symbolize the benefits and profits that she will receive in the near future. As a result of her hard work and perseverance in dedication to work. Interpretation of giving a date in a dream for a single woman: Seeing her dating single women indicates that a handsome young man will propose to ask for her hand in marriage, and happiness and joy will flood her life and her next life and she will live with him with affection and compassion. His position is prestigious among the people and he returns to her country and its people are proud of what he has achieved in a short period of time. Seeing appointments in the dreamer symbolizes the end of the trials and tribulations that affected her life in the previous days due to her betrayal by those around her and their desire to harm her and ruin her life until she is drawn into temptation with them. The world and far from the right path. Interpretation of eating dates in a dream for a single woman: The dream of eating dates for a single woman indicates the calm and stable life that she lives because of the freedom of opinion that her family grants her so that she is independent and can rely on herself in making important decisions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about having a pocket in a dream

preview.html: There is a short, long, wide, narrow robe, etc., and it has many meanings and repercussions when seen in a dream, according to the great interpreters for a married woman, a pregnant woman, and an unmarried girl. Interpretation of seeing a pocket in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a pocket in a dream as a symbol of peace of mind and luxury for the viewer. As for the one who watches, a short pocket indicates Revealing legs indicate false conversations about the priest. Seeing a torn pocket indicates distress, anxiety, worry, lack of money and poverty for the monarch. Whoever sees himself taking out his pocket in a dream indicates that revealing secrets and scandals. Seeing a stolen skirt in a dream means failure in work and study. Perhaps it indicates loss in projects. And leaving work. Seeing a wide pocket indicates a wide diet and many good things. The meaning of seeing a pocket in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen said: Seeing a pocket in a dream indicates wealth and health. As described by a rich man and great wealth. An old jeep in a dream indicates distress and poverty. A dirty pocket in a dream is an indication of a change in the psychological state for the worse, anxiety and sadness. A green sock in a dream indicates comfort and love. It may indicate getting closer to God, an Almighty and happy event. The meaning of seeing a pocket in a single woman’s dream. When a girl dreams of a single long pocket in a dream, this indicates that she will soon get engaged. From the young man she desires. As for seeing herself wearing a short jacket, this is evidence that she made a mistake and fell into her anger, disobedience, and sins. A two-sided jeep in a dream symbolizes the instability of the situation for the worse and psychological changes. Seeing buying a new jeep is a sign of a new happy and joyful period in the future. Who do you see in his pocket? Tearing it and cutting it indicates a period full of difficulties. Interpretation of seeing a pocket in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a husband out of his linen pocket indicates adequate nutrition and a decent life. Whoever sees a narrow pocket in a dream shows lack of religion and corruption of her morals. Anyone who is late in giving birth and sees a long white pocket is a complexion. Good for pregnancy. I see a burning pocket in a dream indicates the presence of people who envy her. The meaning of seeing a pocket in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a long pocket in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. It also means the birth of a male who will be good to his parents. Dreaming of a short skirt indicates a feeling of exhaustion during the months of pregnancy. Meaning Seeing a pocket in a dream according to its color. The red pocket is a symbol of joy and happiness. The black pocket is a symbol of prestige and power. The pink pocket is a symbol of optimism. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dream about juice in a dream?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of the presence of juice in a dream and the interpretation of seeing it: There are a variety of natural drinks extracted from fruits such as peaches, apples, oranges and other juices with a sweet taste. Juice in a dream is considered an important vision that carries many interpretations. With an Egyptian website, we show you the most important dreams with their interpretations through the article below. Juice in a dream The interpretation of a dream about juice in a dream of a dreamer who complains of drought and hardship shows the cover with which God covers him, and gives him a stable job to feed himself and provide accommodation for him and his children if he is married, and this gift will put the dreamer In a state of happiness and contentment in the near future. If the dreamer has been suffering for years from stagnation in his room and sleeping in his bed due to his illness, then his dream of this vision will make him happy because its interpretation means that recovery is coming soon. The jurists said that the delicious juice that we see in the dream is positive and has many connotations. If a young child sees himself drinking a cup of fruit juice, the dream interpretation means that he will be a useful young man when he grows up. If this child has educational inclinations, he will succeed with distinction. Society is better. When a man dreams that he is drinking a natural drink, but with lumps of sugar added to it, then this dream is a sign from the Most Merciful that if his money is small and does not fit with his circumstances and the many requirements of his life, then after the vision his hand will be filled with paper money and his work duties will increase, which Through it, financial gains are multiplied. If a man in his dream enters a large commercial center specializing in selling canned foods and juices and buys his favorite juice and drinks from it until the end, then this dream interprets that the spoils and profits will be his share and he must preserve his livelihood and not waste it so that he does not regret his money and waste it. On trivial things. What is the interpretation of a dream about juice by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of juice in a dream: If it is made of materials that are not suitable for food or drink, such as clay, then the interpretation of the vision indicates the formation of a fetus in the woman’s womb soon, and this interpretation occurs in two cases: The first case is if it The dreamer is married, and the second case is if the dreamer is newly married, he is waiting for his wife to get pregnant and hear the news that he will become a father. As for the unmarried woman, if she sees this vision in her dream, it will be interpreted that God will not deprive her of happiness and love in her life, but rather will give her a lot of it and live Her days are on the way. Love for her soon. Seeing juice in a dream, if a student sees it at the end of the school year or with the exam days approaching, will be a harbinger of unparalleled success. Buying juice in a dream The interpretation of a dream about buying juice for a married woman indicates her emergence from misery and bankruptcy to ease and prosperity. The jurists said If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying a natural fruit drink from juice shops or a ready-made drink in a can, then the vision will indicate that he is on his way to achieving happiness and satisfaction. Drinking juice in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about drinking fresh juice in a dream means that the dreamer’s life will shine with hope

title: What is the interpretation of a white dress in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women, we present to you through today’s article in the encyclopedia. Although it is a sign of joy and happiness in reality, some consider it evidence of death in a dream and are very pessimistic when seeing it, so through the following lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream. The details as reported by the scholar of interpretation Ibn Sirin, so follow us. Interpretation of a white dress in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream Line SirenThe great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a white dress in a dream, contrary to what many believe, is a sign of happiness and joy, God willing. It is also a sign of the goodness of the dreamer and the extent of his faith. And his heart is strengthened. In some cases, the white dress in a dream is evidence of marriage to a pious and righteous girl who respects the rights of God Almighty over her husband, and on the contrary, it can also be a sign of a good husband for her. Unmarried women. If the white dress is lost in a dream, this dream does not bode well at all, as it is a sign of the great distraction that the dreamer is suffering from in life. If the dreamer is married, then her dream of the white dress is a sign that a male baby will be born, God willing. In the near future. If a woman sees herself in a dream wearing a white dress, then her dream is a sign of the happiness and joy that she will experience in life. But if the dress has a little dirt or dust, then this is a sign of anxiety and troubles that she will face in reality. Interpretation Seeing a white dress in a dream for a single woman. The white color in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of how religious and pious she is. It also indicates the high morals that characterize her, and her keen interest in worship. In some cases, the white dress in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign that she will gain a lot of knowledge and enjoy prosperity in her life. If she is of marriageable age, then her dream is a sign that she will marry a pious man who is characterized by piety and piety. Interpretation of the white dress for a married woman: The white dress in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she will live in a state of joy and happiness due to marriage. Her sister or a family member. If a married woman is expecting pregnancy, then seeing a white dress in a dream foretells her in the very near future. But if she feels sad and upset while wearing a white dress in a dream, this is a sign that she will not get what she wants in reality. God's destiny. Since the white color in a dream is generally a sign of peace and tranquility as well as good news, perhaps a dress that carries this color is evidence that she will be able to get rid of the worries and sorrows that are accumulating on her, and get many of her thoughts. This could be A dream in a married woman's dream is a reflection of the state of friendship and love in which she lives in reality with her husband. Or that it is a sign of her good condition and her piety. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a pregnant woman: colour

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rosary and its most important meanings

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing a rosary is an Islamic supplication, which is saying a supplication and also asking for mercy and forgiveness from God Almighty. Counting it has become easier with the number of beads it consists of, and recently the electronic rosary has become dominant in counting the rosary. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the rosary. Interpretation of seeing the rosary. Seeing the rosary in a dream is considered good news for the dreamer, and the rosary reminds the Muslim of his Islamic memories, and it is a sign of getting closer to God and praising Him. For the blessings he gave. For us, it is also evidence of the state of stability and happiness that that person is experiencing: A married man who sees a rosary in his dream is evidence that God will bless him and his family. It is also evidence that God will bless him with good offspring. Likewise, an unmarried young man is blessed with a good girl with Good morals when he sees the rosary in his dream. Also, the unmarried girl will achieve her dreams and ambitions and will be close to God - the Almighty - if she sees the rosary in her dream. As for the married woman who sees the rosary in her life, it indicates the state of stability and happiness that she lives with her husband. Also, A divorced woman solves her problems and lives stably if she sees the rosary in her dream. Likewise, a pregnant woman goes through an easy and easy birth process when she sees the rosary in her dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream and its effects in detail. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rosary. Pink is considered one of the most beautiful colors and brings comfort when seen. Seeing a rosary in a dream in this color is considered good news in most dreams, but there are colors that do not bode well when we see it in a dream, and each color has a specific interpretation, but most of them bode well: A person will achieve his dreams and goals in general when he sees a pink rosary in his dream. He will also live A life full of happiness and stability if he sees the rosary in his dream. Also, the blue rosary for a man in his dream shows the abundant money that he will earn. In addition, an unmarried girl will be engaged to a good man when she sees the rosary in her dream. As for her seeing the blue rosary, it is a testimony to her success in achieving her dreams. And achieving her goals. Also, if a married woman sees the rosary in her dream, this indicates her happiness with her pregnancy soon. In addition, seeing the green rosary is an indication that her children will be fair with her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fulfilling a desire in a dream by the most famous interpretation scholars. Vision A brown rosary in a dream. Interpreters interpreted the dream of a rosary as good in general, but it differs from one person to another according to the situation in which that person lives or according to the dream itself, in the form of the rosary and how it is shaped or colored: Seeing a rosary in a dream is good news for the dreamer and indicates an abundance of Wealth and kindness. An unmarried girl will marry a religious man with good morals if she sees the brown rosary in her dream. He will also find work and livelihood from God. Also, a married woman will be blessed by God and have many good offspring when she sees the brown rosary in her dream. Moreover, It indicates that she will become pregnant

title: What is the interpretation of the dream number 36 in Ibn Sirin’s dream for an unmarried woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about number 36 in a dream for a single woman: Numbers are very important in our lives. We use them all the time, whether in daily calculations and transactions or in writing down memories such as a loved one’s birthday or a happy occasion that we celebrate. Therefore, it is the center of our lives, and it has a benefit that makes us unable to eliminate it from our dealings, and seeing it in a dream is a clear and essential symbol in the interpretation of the dream. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. What is the interpretation of dream number 36 in A dream? Numbers in a dream predict what will happen in the future, so do not underestimate seeing them in a dream, because they link your psychological state to what will happen to you in the near future. It can symbolize longevity, an imminent marriage, a new opportunity to travel, or multiple offspring. It symbolizes achieving a goal you strive for and achieving goals. The coming period may require you to remain silent to avoid crises. Discrimination in treatment between individuals, it can be a family It can be a collection of work. It indicates that you are overcoming a problem in your life or hearing bad news that disturbs your life. Reluctance to make important decisions about your life. It indicates not observing God in actions or words. Accomplishing an important work in the life of the seeking dreamer. Meaning On the pursuit of knowledge and the pursuit of the highest scholarly and academic titles. It denotes a vow of repentance for something. title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it

preview.html: Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it. In fact, killing a mouse is a relaxing way because it is characterized by destruction and relaxation. By following the lines, we will explain all the details so that the reader’s heart is reassured and he is not distracted between different connotations. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it. Seeing a mouse in a dream, killing the dreamer, means that he expels enemies and crooks and checks their tricks that planned to destroy him, and kill many innocent people. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a girl It leads to saving her from a vile person who was trying to ruin her life and harm her in the previous period, and killing a mouse in a woman’s dream indicates a very good thing that she will enjoy in the coming era due to her good morals, her good treatment of people, and her kindness to the poor and needy. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it for the dreamer indicates the good news that will happen to him in the coming days. Get rid of the adversities and obstacles that he faced at work and that affected him. Seeing the mouse in the girl’s dream and killing it prompts him to get rid of the fraudsters and keep them out of his life so that he can live happily and safely away from conflicts, battles, danger and caring for them. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the world. Arabic, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it for an unmarried woman. Seeing a mouse in a dream, killing an unmarried woman, indicates the good luck that she will enjoy in her later years because she avoids the path of deception and temptation lest she Her Lord becomes angry with her. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing a girl means that she will find a suitable job opportunity that will improve her financial income for the better so that she can succeed in achieving her dreams so that everyone can benefit from them. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it for a married woman. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing a married woman indicates a happy married life. Which she lives after her victory over the haters and those who resent the affection and love that she lives with her husband, and he is independent of her and is useful to society later. Seeing a mouse being killed by a dreamer in a dream leads her to learn the news of her pregnancy in the next few days after she is freed from the diseases that prevented her from being an heiress in the previous period. Beware before wasting time, repent. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it for a pregnant woman: Seeing a mouse killing a pregnant woman in a dream, indicates the happy life she will live after the birth of the child she has been wishing for from her Lord for a long time. Seeing a mouse in the dreamer’s dream leads her to give birth to a boy in the coming period and be healthy. She is good and will not suffer from any disease. Killing a mouse by the husband in the dreamer’s dream shows his support for her. So that he can safely pass through this stage and live with her with joy and happiness. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing it for a divorced woman. Dreaming about a mouse killing a divorced woman symbolizes her victory over her ex-husband and getting rid of the problems and disputes that happened to her because of him, so she can live in peace and stability away from him. Worse. Seeing a mouse in a dream and killing the dreamer indicates her imminent marriage contract with R

title: Interpretation of seeing that a person is wrapped and buried in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an opinion that a person is wrapped and buried in a dream in his real life or the appearance of sad things with him that can affect him, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing an opinion that a person is wrapped and buried in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a person wrapped and burying a soul in a dream. Shroud in a dream indicates If something happens that angers the Blessed and Most High God, which is (adultery), then the dreamer should stay away from this immorality. And whoever sees in his dream that he is dead, covered with a shroud and completely wrapped, then this dream is a warning from God, Blessed and Most High, that the dreamer repents for his sins, because he may be... He was about to die. Whoever sees in his dream that he is dead and covered with a shroud, but his head and legs are uncovered and not covered, this is evidence that the dreamer has clear corruption in his religion and in his relationship with God Almighty. And whoever sees in his dream that there are people he does not know who are dressing him in new, very luxurious clothes without order or reason. It is announced, then they disappear and leave him alone. This dream indicates the death of the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a shroud in a dream for a single woman. Whoever sees in her dream that she died and the shroud covered her entire body, then this is a good and good sign of marriage in the near future, because the shroud here symbolizes the covering and the dress of joy, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a shroud in a dream for a pregnant woman who saw it in her dream. That she died and was shrouded, this indicates that the dreamer will be born with a brother, and God will decree for her the work of Hajj or Umrah, God willing, and the shroud will appear in this dream. Ihram clothing. Interpretation of a dream: To see someone who saw that he covered someone and buried him in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he wrapped and buried someone he knows in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will cause him a lot of problems and he will leave his family and homeland and travel for a long time and that he will expose them a lot. Care. I worry.Interpretation of a dream about seeing the body of a deceased person in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream his death or burial, and the time is midday and the weather is mild and beautiful, this is evidence that the dreamer is blessed with him, the most blessed and the most blessed. high. He is in good health and may God bless his life. Whoever sees in his dream that the weather is warming late at night and the place was dark and heavy rain fell, then this dream is undesirable, indicating the emergence of major problems for the dreamer in his family life and his professional career in his life. Work or in his trade. Whoever sees in a dream that he is burying a person in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is going through an important matter in his life and will make the right decision in it, such as (trade, marriage, work) and admiration. Whoever sees in his dream that he is burying a person he knew in The past, this is evidence that the dreamer fears death and thinks about it for a long time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is burying someone he knows and there are already problems between them, this indicates that the dreamer will triumph over him, God willing. Whoever dreams of burying a living person, these dreams indicate great enmity. And severe pain. Interpretation of dreams to see the burial of an unmarried woman in a dream. Burying the dead in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the emergence of some problems in the family environment due to marriage problems. It also indicates that she will fail in her studies or work. Whoever sees in his dream that she will

title: Learn the interpretation of the dream of traveling by car by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a trip by car: The methods that people use to travel vary, and there are those who prefer large and powerful means of transportation, but it may take some time, and there are those who prefer to drive their car and go to the place they want. Hey, you are traveling by car in a dream, what does that mean? In our article, we present the most important interpretations of a dream about traveling by car. Interpretation of dreams about a trip by car Interpretation scholars explain that a person traveling by car in a dream symbolizes a change in things in his reality, and this change depends on the condition of the trip, the shape of the car, and the route he traveled. In the event that you are traveling by car and see that you are quickly going to The place you have planned, we can say that the road to your dreams will be good and wide and you can fulfill most of these desires. As for traveling with your family, the topic indicates that there are good surprises for all family members, God willing. If you are driving a beautiful, large car and it is black in color, the focus will be on the high position that you will soon occupy, while a white car may indicate the marriage of a single person. Interpretation A dream about a car trip by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that traveling by car confirms the wonderful events that will soon prevail in the dreamer’s life, such as a high position at work or his marriage. He interprets the dream according to the color of the car and sees that white is one of the favorite colors because he is likely to live a very calm human life. In addition to his praiseworthy resume. It is a good sign that the student follows his car trips, especially if it is the exam period, so as not to collide with obstacles in the future. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type in the dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about car trips for individualsIf you dream If a girl drives a car and travels a long road, this means that she has many burdens and responsibilities related to family or work, but she bears them with great skill, is not afraid of them, and always takes care of herself. The responsibility that matters to her. It is possible to understand some of the connotations of the girl’s personality in the dream of traveling by car. If she feels calm, then her real affairs are stable and you do not notice any differences in them, while her fear of the road or her reluctance to do so. Traveling can explain a state of confusion and fear about some things related to the future. Interpretation of a dream about car trips with parents for single people. Jurists focus on the family situation when traveling by car with an unmarried girl, and from here comes the correct interpretation. As it is in the case of anger and disapproval of this trip, or a breakdown. While the girl is driving the car with her family, there will be unstable psychological conditions for her and she hopes to get rid of those negatives and things that hurt her, but unfortunately, life situations always put pressure on her and surprise her and she does not find comfort. Interpretation of a dream about traveling by car for a married woman If the married woman drives the car to travel And she goes to another new place with her husband, the scholars indicate that there is a major change in her life, such as finding a home.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing prickly pear in a dream

preview.html: Prickly pear in a dream. It is one of the summer fruits that everyone loves because of its distinctive taste. Its interpretations vary regarding the appearance of prickly pear in a dream, and often some people have an idea about it and are looking for an explanation for it. We present the following in detail this vision... Prickly pear in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about prickly pear in a dream varies from one person to another according to his social status. If a girl eats prickly pear, this indicates the abundance of goodness and good nutrition that she will receive in the coming days. A person’s vision of prickly pear The prickly pear in his dream indicates the extent of the sadness he is suffering from at that time, but with the grace of God it will disappear and he will be freed from it. If the dreamer is young and sees in his dream a dry prickly pear, then this is a sign of recovery from diseases and abundant nutrition. The prickly pear in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin The prickly pear in a dream carries connotations of good and evil. If the dreamer who studies the prickly pear sees it in his dream, this is good news for great success and obtaining the highest bikes. The dreamer’s vision of the prickly pear in his dream is a sign of his livelihood and excellence in his professional life. If the dreamer is a merchant And he sees prickly pears in his dream, then this is interpreted as profits and huge profit that he will receive. If he sees prickly pears in a dream, this means sadness, severe suffering, problems and obstacles that he will find in his life. When you see prickly pears in black color, this is a sign of lies and deception. Fig. Prickly pear in Al-Osaimi’s dream: Al-Osaimi’s dream of a prickly pear is interpreted as a sign of goodness and happiness that will enter the dreamer’s life and he will reach a high position, whether on a personal or practical level. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream carrying a prickly pear means that she has good morals and that everyone speaks kindly about her. Prickly pear in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates the imminent date of her marriage to a young man with high morals and good characteristics. There is an interpretation that explains that seeing prickly pear in her dream means She is going through a sad and difficult time, but by God’s will, it will disappear. When an unmarried girl eats prickly pears in her dream, it means that good will will come to her and that she will receive a lot of sustenance. Seeing prickly pears in a person’s dream leads to achieving what she desires and achieving many goals. And elevating it. Prickly pear in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a married woman is nothing but goodness and good luck in her life and enjoying stability with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about prickly pear for a dreamer and eating from it is a sign of justice and prosperity that she experiences and the blessing that surrounds her family. In the event that The dreamer saw prickly pears in a dream, this is a sign of bad luck and misfortunes that will strike the family, so he must be careful and protect his home. When a married woman dreams of distributing figs to her children, this means that she is raising her children according to the rules of prickly pears.
